body:
Wrap a form around this code in 

https://github.com/CarlosGabaldon/fossa/blob/master/app/views/features/_feature.html.erb#L11

```Ruby
<%= form_for feature, 
         :as => :feature, 
         :remote => true,
         :url => project_feature_path(@project, feature),   
         :loading => 'App.disableProjectForm()',
         :complete => 'App.enableProjectForm()',
         :html => {:id => 'feature-form', :method => :put } do |f| %>
               <%= f.text_field 'name', :size => 60 %>
               <%= f.text_area 'description',  :size => "60x10" %>
               <%= select :feature, :priority_id, @priorities.collect {|p| [ p.name, p.id ] } %>

               <%= f.check_box_tag "feature[completed]", feature.completed %>

               <%= submit_tag 'Complete' %> 
               <%= image_tag 'indicator.gif', :id => 'form-indicator', :style => 'display:none;' %>
             <% end %>

```
title: Enable completing features

body: Add a method to mark a task as completed.
title: Need a method to mark a task as completed
